TextBlock.Text: DEUTZIA: How to access the <color=orange>Central Core</color>:
DEUTZIA: You must first use this interface to open the <color=orange>Equitorial Towers</color>.

DEUTZIA: Two Nomai must then go to the <color=orange>Equitorial Towers</color> and activate both towers within 15 seconds. This cannot be done alone as <color=orange>The Astrophytum</color> is too large to get to the other tower in time.
DEUTZIA: Once that is done, you will be able to access the <color=orange>Central Core</color>.
